Description: Handle sliver of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 200, 17. Name Leontidas. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0169.09.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1116)
